name: BMB OS
description:
One completely normal Halloween day, you came home to discover something completely normal, that is, your bed. Nothing was wrong with the bed. Nothing was wrong with the walls. In fact, it seemed almost TOO normal. That was when you noticed a pumpkin bomb underneath your bed!

Fortunately, the developer left a handy operating system on the pumpkin for you to stop it from exploding...that is, if you can manage the horribly programmed interface!

Works for both mobile and PC.

Made for the One Minute Jam #8.
